numbered_ace_sentences: 1. At least 60 percent of the players in every league shown are colored people.
2. At least 13 percent of the head coaches in every league shown are colored people.
3. I wonder why the leagues shown are mostly dominated by colored players.
5. Sports are becoming more available to more people.
6. It is reasonable to assume that there will be more diversity among players.
7. It is reasonable to assume that there will be more diversity among coaches.
8. The headline is: The percent of colored people coaching and playing in national leagues.
